mission_description: Starfleet Command has assigned the Enterprise-D to investigate an unusual tachyon surge detected near the cardassian border. The situation demands careful assessment of local conditions, crew readiness, and potential diplomatic consequences. Captain Picard and his senior officers must evaluate risks, maintain Federation principles, and ensure the safety of all involved while preserving stability in the sector.
starfleet_message:
To: Captain Jean-Luc Picard, USS Enterprise-D.
From: Starfleet Command.
Subject: Mission Orders.
Captain, you are ordered to proceed immediately to the designated coordinates. Further details are enclosed.
crew_dialogue: Data: 'Captain, sensors confirm the situation is developing rapidly. Awaiting your command.'
text: The Enterprise-D has arrived on station. Starfleet has tasked the crew with handling a complex situation requiring immediate command attention.

options.label: Initiate diplomatic contact.
Raise shields and go to yellow alert.
Conduct a detailed scan before proceeding.
Inform Starfleet Command of the situation.
Hold position and monitor from a safe distance.

debriefs.text: The mission resulted in success. Ethical judgment remained aligned with Federation principles.
The mission resulted in partial success. Ethical judgment remained aligned with Federation principles.
The mission resulted in failure. Tactical readiness ensured minimal damage to ship and crew.
The mission resulted in ethical conflict. Crew initiative was commendable despite unanticipated complications.
The mission resulted in commendation. Further debrief recommended to refine command strategy.

starfleet_message:
To: Captain Jean-Luc Picard, USS Enterprise-D.
From: Starfleet Command.
Subject: Mission Orders.
Captain, you are ordered to proceed immediately to the designated coordinates. Further details are enclosed.
crew_dialogue: La Forge: 'Captain, sensors confirm the situation is developing rapidly. Awaiting your command.'
text: The Enterprise-D has arrived on station. Starfleet has tasked the crew with handling a complex situation requiring immediate command attention.

options.label: Initiate diplomatic contact.
Raise shields and go to yellow alert.
Conduct a detailed scan before proceeding.
Inform Starfleet Command of the situation.
Hold position and monitor from a safe distance.

debriefs.text: The mission resulted in success. Tactical readiness ensured minimal damage to ship and crew.
The mission resulted in partial success. Ethical judgment remained aligned with Federation principles.
The mission resulted in failure. Further debrief recommended to refine command strategy.
The mission resulted in ethical conflict. Ethical judgment remained aligned with Federation principles.
The mission resulted in commendation. Tactical readiness ensured minimal damage to ship and crew.

mission_description: Starfleet Command has assigned the Enterprise-D to conduct peacekeeping operations near the tzenkethi frontier. The situation demands careful assessment of local conditions, crew readiness, and potential diplomatic consequences. Captain Picard and his senior officers must evaluate risks, maintain Federation principles, and ensure the safety of all involved while preserving stability in the sector.
starfleet_message:
To: Captain Jean-Luc Picard, USS Enterprise-D.
From: Starfleet Command.
Subject: Mission Orders.
Captain, you are ordered to proceed immediately to the designated coordinates. Further details are enclosed.
crew_dialogue: Crusher: 'Captain, sensors confirm the situation is developing rapidly. Awaiting your command.'
text: The Enterprise-D has arrived on station. Starfleet has tasked the crew with handling a complex situation requiring immediate command attention.

options.label: Initiate diplomatic contact.
Raise shields and go to yellow alert.
Conduct a detailed scan before proceeding.
Inform Starfleet Command of the situation.
Hold position and monitor from a safe distance.

debriefs.text: The mission resulted in success. Your leadership reflected exemplary Starfleet conduct.
The mission resulted in partial success. Crew initiative was commendable despite unanticipated complications.
The mission resulted in failure. Crew initiative was commendable despite unanticipated complications.
